title: Want to have some random fun with randomly selected champions/builds?

embed.description: Ultimate Bravery is a way to play League of Legends. You will be given a randomized hero, spells and items, to make your games more spicy! Be brave! Join the Ultimate Bravery challenge!

body: Hey all, just looking for some people who want to have some crazy fun trying out "ultimate bravery" where you are given a randomly selected champion with a whacky build, summoner spells and masteries. Add me if your interested!
